-- This file is generated from NestedMachine.ump --

 -- This defines a NuSMV module for Sm --
 MODULE Sm ( _smS2 ) 

   -- This part declares input variables for the given NuSMV module --
   IVAR
     event : { e1 , e2 , e3 , e4 };
    
   -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     state : { s1 , s2 , s3 , s4 };
    
   -- This part defines macros that summarize the transitions of the given NuSMV module --
   DEFINE
     t1 := event = e1 & state = s1;
     t2 := event = e2 & state = s1;
     t3 := event = e3 & state = s1;
     t4 := event = e1 & state = s2;
     t5 := event = e3 & _smS2.state = s2a;
     t6 := event = e3 & _smS2.state = s2b;
     t7 := event = e4 & _smS2.state = s2b;
     t8 := event = e2 & _smS2.state = s2b;
  
   -- This part defines the transitions from states to states for the given NuSMV module --
   ASSIGN
     init( state ) := s1;
     next( state ) := case
       t4 : s1;
       t1 | t5 | t6 | t2 | t8 : s2;
       t7 : s3;
       t3 : s4;
       TRUE : state;
     esac;
 
   
 -- This defines a NuSMV module for SmS2 --
 MODULE SmS2 ( _sm ) 

   -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     state : { s2a , s2b , s2c , null };
    
   -- This part defines the transitions from states to states for the given NuSMV module --
   ASSIGN
     init( state ) := null;
     next( state ) := case
       _sm.t1 | _sm.t6 | _sm.state = s2 : s2a;
       _sm.t2 | _sm.t5 : s2b;
       _sm.t8 : s2c;
       TRUE : state;
     esac;
 
   
 -- This defines a NuSMV module for main --
 MODULE main

   -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     sm : Sm( smS2 );
     smS2 : SmS2( sm );
    
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( sm.state = s1 )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( sm.state = s2 )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( sm.state = s3 )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( sm.state = s4 )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( smS2.state = s2a )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( smS2.state = s2b )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( smS2.state = s2c )
